name: Insignia™ - 32" Class F20 Series LED HD Smart Fire TV
description: Shop Insignia™ 32" Class F20 Series LED HD Smart Fire TV at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Extra room
reviews.reviewBody:
Title: Great Entry-Level TV with Surprising Performance

I recently purchased the 32-inch Insignia TV, and overall, I am quite pleased with its performance. Here's my detailed review based on my individual experience using it:

Firstly, the size of the TV is perfect for smaller spaces like bedrooms or kitchens. It doesn't overpower the room but still provides a decent viewing experience. The 720p resolution may not be the highest available, but for everyday use, it is more than sufficient.

The display quality exceeded my expectations. The colors are vibrant, and the contrast is impressive, resulting in a sharp and detailed image. I was particularly surprised by the wider viewing angles, allowing everyone in the room to enjoy the picture without any noticeable distortion.

In terms of sound quality, the built-in speakers deliver clear and decent audio. While it might not match a high-end home theater system, it is more than satisfactory for regular TV viewing. Additionally, the TV offers various audio settings, allowing you to adjust it to your liking.

Setting up the TV was a breeze, thanks to the straightforward on-screen guide. It connected effortlessly to my cable box, streaming devices, and gaming consoles. The HDMI and USB ports are conveniently located on the side, making it easy to access and connect various devices.

One feature that impressed me was the user-friendly interface. Navigating through menus and settings was intuitive, and I was able to customize the TV to my preferences quickly. The remote control, although basic, was responsive and easy to use.

However, the TV does have a few drawbacks. While the overall build quality is decent, the plastic frame feels a bit flimsy. Additionally, the TV lacks advanced image processing capabilities, so fast-moving scenes or sports might display some motion blur.

Considering its affordable price point, the 32-inch Insignia TV provides excellent value for money. It offers solid display quality, good sound, and easy setup, making it a great option for those seeking an entry-level TV. I feel that it meets all the essential criteria one would expect from a television in this price range.

In conclusion, if you're in the market for a budget-friendly TV with surprising performance, the 32-inch Insignia TV is a solid choice. It may not have all the bells and whistles of high-end models, but it more than makes up for it with its impressive display quality and user-friendly interface.

reviews.name: Awesome TV at a steal price
reviews.reviewBody:
I recently purchased this TV and I'm thoroughly impressed! The picture quality is stunning, with vibrant colors and crystal-clear clarity. The sound system is also top-notch, delivering immersive audio that enhances my viewing experience.


What's even better is the price - it's an absolute steal! I was expecting to break the bank, but this TV exceeded my expectations without draining my wallet.


Five stars and highly recommended!

reviews.name: Insignia
reviews.reviewBody: This television was a very good move for us.It was very easy to set up and has a very good picture. I would recommend this purchase for anyone looking for an inexpensive but practical set.

primaryImage.altText: Front. Insignia™ - 32" Class F20 Series LED HD Smart Fire TV - Black.

videos.title: Insignia - 32 Class F20 Series LED HD Smart Fire TV Features

descriptions.long: Access live over-the-air channels and streaming with this 32-inch TV—and control it all with your voice. Ask Alexa to launch apps, search for titles and more. A HD experience in 720p provides crystal clear images. You won’t miss a second with the Insignia NS-32F201NA23 32" Class F20 Series LED HD Smart Fire TV.

specifications.definition: Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.
The number and type of USB ports the product has.

Surround sound systems use multiple audio channels and speakers to create an immersive sound experience for the listener. There are also various proprietary technologies that imitate this kind of sound via a device's built-in speakers or soundbar.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.

Backward, downward, and front-firing speakers direct sound into the room from those respective directions. A soundbar is typically long and rectangular, and designed to act as an all-in-one speaker with greater sound production than that of a TV alone. An acoustic surface is the result of small sound actuators embedded directly behind the screen, turning the entire screen's surface into a speaker.
Refers to the number of pixels, both horizontally and vertically, used to capture video/images. The higher the resolution the finer the detail that can be seen.
The ability for a device to perform a specific function, or functions, based on a spoken command, that is received by a microphone integrated with the device.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Feature that blocks television programming if it has a content rating outside of the acceptable rating(s) configured by the user.
The horizontal measurement of the stand/base, or the distance from the outside of one leg to the outside of the opposite leg, as it is attached to the product.

values: 32" Class F20 Series LED HD Smart Fire TV

canonicalValues.value: 32" Class F20 Series LED HD Smart Fire TV

specifications.definition: Part of a group of the same product type with similar features.
The device features an interface that allows for the connection of headphones.
The device is capable of connecting to another device in order to send or receive streaming content. Share content from your mobile device to your TV or vice versa.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Smart, or smart-capable devices are able to connect directly to your home network in order to stream content from the Internet, run Internet-based apps, or connect to other smart devices.
The group size measurement of a screen. This differs from a screen size measured diagonally from corner to corner.
Indicates the appropriate environment product was designed to be used in.
The text version of spoken audio displayed on the screen. Devices that can display closed captioning typically have the option to toggle the feature on or off.

The wireless networking standard used by the device. Each iteration of the standard developed by the Wi-Fi Alliance corresponds to an existing IEEE 802.11 protocol; for example, standard 802.11ac (or AC) is termed Wi-Fi 5. Refers specifically to the standard the device is designed to use, but ultimately determines product interoperability and backward compatibility including previous versions.
This input is used to connect devices such as antennas or cable boxes to a TV via a coaxial cable.
Compatible with or able to be connected to other smart devices or applications.
A system that converts language text into speech.
The total number of USB ports including all generations and versions.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
The battery size required for operation.
An HDR-compatible 4K TV or other HDR-compatible product displays HDR video content when it's available from sources like 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray Discs and 4K streaming services.

Edge-lit: lights are on the edges of the display with ~10 zones of vertical LEDs. Direct-lit: lights are on the edges and behind the screen for more light uniformity than Edge-lit. Full array: direct-lit with local dimming for greater contrast with up to 100 zones of LEDs.
The available language options for displayed text or captions.

The ATSC TV Tuner is a component built into conventional TV sets or other devices for receiving over-the-air broadcast TV without a cable/satellite box. Digital tuners may be purchased separately and connected to a device if it does not have one built in.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
The number and type of connectors used to connect to an external display.

The Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool (EPEAT) was designed to provide an environmental assessment tool for purchasers. In order to qualify for EPEAT, a product must meet all 23 required criteria.
VESA wall mount standards refer to the spacing of screw holes built into a TV in order to fit with standard TV wall mounts. These standards are implemented into most TVs and monitors.
Casts the screen of one device onto another wirelessly, using a common protocol (typically Bluetooth).

Indicates whether the device features descriptive video service (DVS). This service provides narration of key elements in the program, such as actions, costumes, and scene changes, to help engage visually-impaired audiences.

Just like a computer, a smart TV needs an operating system (also called a smart platform) in order to access the Internet, connect with entertainment apps, and play streaming content. Some common TV smart platforms are; Roku TV, Android TV, and Chromecast.
Whether the stand can adjust to have more than one measurement either between the legs or the base itself.
Streaming services and other programs are available on this device. Keep in mind, there may be more services supported than just those shown here.
Size of the screen, measured diagonally from corner to corner.
The number of frames per second the device can produce natively without enhancement. Higher rates help produce smooth, seamless pictures.
The Bluetooth specification formalized by the Bluetooth Special Interest Group. All versions of the Bluetooth standard are backwards compatible with previous versions.

features.title: Alexa voice control
features.description: The Alexa Voice Remote lets you easily control your entertainment, search across apps, switch inputs, and more using just your voice. Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to easily find, launch, and control content, and even switch to cable.

features.title: Access millions of shows with Fire TV
features.description: Watch over 1 million streaming movies and TV episodes with access to thousands of channels, apps and Alexa skills, including Netflix, Apple TV, Prime Video, Disney +, Hulu, Sling TV, YouTube, HBO Max, Spotify, Peacock, ESPN+ and more right from this TV.*

features.title: DTS TruSurround
features.description: This multi-channel format creates an immersive surround sound experience through your TV’s speakers.

features.title: Supports Apple AirPlay
features.description: Share videos, photos, music and more from an Apple device to your TV with the touch of a button.

features.title: Supports HDMI ARC
features.description: Sends audio directly from the HDMI jack to a compatible soundbar or AV receiver, removing the need for an extra cable.

features.title: 720p resolution
features.description: Watch movies and TV shows in high-definition picture quality.

features.title: Versatile connections
features.description: Connect your home theater components such as a Blu-ray player, game console, speakers, cable/antenna and more. TV connections include 3 HDMI ports, composite (AV) jacks, digital optical output, USB port, headphone jack, coaxial jack, ethernet port and Wi-Fi technology.

features.title: LED-backlit LCD screen
features.description: With reliable and long-lasting LED lighting, this LCD screen delivers a wide range of colors and contrast for a memorable viewing experience.

features.title: Parental controls
features.description: Manage your children’s viewing by blocking content based on program ratings or entire channels. Once the kids are in bed, access whatever you want with a simple PIN.

features.title: Wall mountable
features.description: Compatible with VESA pattern 100 × 100 for simple and safe wall mounting.

features.title: Sustainably Focused
features.description: The outer package for this product has been manufactured with sustainably sourced paper, certified by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC®). FSC certification ensures that packaging comes from responsibly managed forests to help protect the planet—today and tomorrow.
*Web-based services and content require high-speed Internet service. Some services may require a subscription.
